alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 12:41PM CDT until May 19 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Mitchell County in north central Iowa... Northwestern Howard County in northeastern Iowa... Southeastern Mower County in southeastern Minnesota... Southwestern Fillmore County in southeastern Minnesota... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1240 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Adams, or 15 miles southeast of Austin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 1 inch hail in Lyle at 1235 PM. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Le Roy around 1250 PM CDT. Spring Valley around 100 PM CDT. Wykoff around 110 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Forestville State Park, Etna, York, Cherry Grove, Ostrander, Greenleafton and County Roads 4 And 8. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
